snippet: With an impulsive punch on Monday night, Amar’e Stoudemire probably ended his season and surely hastened his team’s exit from the playoffs.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column asserts that New York Knicks forward Amar'e Stoudemire hastened his team's exit from the playoffs by punching fire extinguisher case after team's loss to Miami Heat; suggests that outburst was not about a single game but the culmination of disappointment that the team is not better than it is.
lead_paragraph: With an impulsive punch on Monday night, Amar’e Stoudemire probably ended his season and surely hastened his team’s exit from the playoffs.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs — Knicks’ Amar’e Stoudemire Is Likely Out Rest of Series
headline.main: Illusions Shatter With a Left to a Fire Extinguisher Case
headline.print_headline: Illusions Shatter With a Left To a Fire Extinguisher Case
